lead_paragraph: Bobbing on Rio de Janeiro's Guanabara Bay in a blue and white fishing boat, American sailor Brad Funk uses a plastic bin to scoop rubbish from the waters where Olympic sailing races will take place next month.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Sailor Lends Hand to Clean Rio's Bay Before Games
headline.main: U.S. Sailor Lends Hand to Clean Rio's Bay Before Games

snippet: Bobbing on Rio de Janeiro's Guanabara Bay in a blue and white fishing boat, American sailor Brad Funk uses a plastic bin to scoop rubbish from the waters where Olympic sailing races will take place next month....
